useCase.name: Generate Sales Report
useCase.description: Generate a sales report for the owner

successEndConditions.condition: Sales report is successfully generated and displayed to the owner

failureEndConditions.condition: Unable to generate and display the sales report

mainSequence.step: Frontend Interface sends API call to Backend System for sales data
Backend System queries Reporting Module to generate sales report
Reporting Module fetches sales data from Database
Sales data is sent from Database to Reporting Module
Sales report is generated by Reporting Module
Backend System displays sales report data to Frontend Interface
Frontend Interface shows sales report to the Owner
